recipesJson.name: XXX Blueberry Pomegranate Acai
recipesJson.author: BubbasBrewz
recipesJson.description:
Random stab at a blueberry pomegranate acai Vitamin Water ©® I feel like I've had countless candies and drinks with this flavor combo. This is my attempt at a more commercial type juice. Hence the higher flavor content. Will adapt after mixing.

Thick and wet blueberry taste on the inhale, followed by the sensation of pomegranate as it enters the lung. Tart and crisp acai berry notes on the exhale. Very tantalizing ADV option.
